1: %%%===================================================================
    2: %%% @copyright (C) 2011, Erlang Solutions Ltd.
    3: %%% @doc Suite for testing mod_offline* modules
    4: %%% @end
    5: %%%===================================================================
    6: 
    7: -module(offline_SUITE).
    8: -compile(export_all).
    9: 
   10: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   11: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   12: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   13: 
   14: -define(MAX_OFFLINE_MSGS, 100). % known server-side config
   15: 
   16: %%%===================================================================
   17: %%% Suite configuration
   18: %%%===================================================================
   19: 
   20: all() ->
   21:     [{group, mod_offline_tests}].
   22: 
   23: all_tests() ->
   24:     [offline_message_is_stored_and_delivered_at_login,
   25:      error_message_is_not_stored,
   26:      groupchat_message_is_not_stored,
   27:      headline_message_is_not_stored,
   28:      expired_messages_are_not_delivered,
   29:      max_offline_messages_reached
   30:     ].
   31: 
   32: groups() ->
   33:     [{mod_offline_tests, [parallel, shuffle], all_tests()}].
   34: 
   35: suite() ->
   36:     escalus:suite().
   37: 
   38: %%%===================================================================
   39: %%% Init & teardown
   40: %%%===================================================================
   41: 
   42: init_per_suite(C) -> escalus:init_per_suite(C).
   43: end_per_suite(C) -> escalus_fresh:clean(), escalus:end_per_suite(C).
   44: init_per_testcase(Name, C) -> escalus:init_per_testcase(Name, C).
   45: end_per_testcase(Name, C) -> escalus:end_per_testcase(Name, C).
   46: 
   47: %%%===================================================================
   48: %%% offline tests
   49: %%%===================================================================
   50: 
   51: offline_message_is_stored_and_delivered_at_login(Config) ->
   52:     Story =
   53:         fun(FreshConfig, Alice, Bob) ->
   54:                 logout(Bob),
   55:                 escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to
   56:                                       (Bob, <<"msgtxt">>)),
   57:                 NewBob = login_send_presence(FreshConfig, bob),
   58:                 Stanzas = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(NewBob, 2),
   59:                 escalus_new_assert:mix_match
   60:                   ([is_presence, is_chat(<<"msgtxt">>)],
   61:                    Stanzas)
   62:         end,
   63:     escalus:fresh_story_with_config(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], Story).
   64: 
   65: error_message_is_not_stored(Config) ->
   66:     Story = fun(FreshConfig, Alice, Bob) ->
   67:                     logout(Bob),
   68:                     AliceJid = escalus_client:full_jid(Alice),
   69:                     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:message
   70:                               (AliceJid, Bob, <<"error">>, <<"msgtxt">>)),
   71:                     NewBob = login_send_and_receive_presence(FreshConfig, bob),
   72:                     ct:sleep(500),
   73:                     false = escalus_client:has_stanzas(NewBob)
   74:             end,
   75:     escalus:fresh_story_with_config(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], Story).
   76: 
   77: groupchat_message_is_not_stored(Config) ->
   78:     Story = fun(FreshConfig, Alice, Bob) ->
   79:                     logout(Bob),
   80:                     AliceJid = escalus_client:full_jid(Alice),
   81:                     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:message
   82:                               (AliceJid, Bob, <<"groupchat">>, <<"msgtxt">>)),
   83:                     NewBob = login_send_and_receive_presence(FreshConfig, bob),
   84:                     ct:sleep(500),
   85:                     false = escalus_client:has_stanzas(NewBob)
   86:             end,
   87:     escalus:fresh_story_with_config(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], Story).
   88: 
   89: headline_message_is_not_stored(Config) ->
   90:     Story = fun(FreshConfig, Alice, Bob) ->
   91:                     logout(Bob),
   92:                     AliceJid = escalus_client:full_jid(Alice),
   93:                     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:message
   94:                               (AliceJid, Bob, <<"headline">>, <<"msgtxt">>)),
   95:                     NewBob = login_send_and_receive_presence(FreshConfig, bob),
   96:                     ct:sleep(500),
   97:                     false = escalus_client:has_stanzas(NewBob)
   98:             end,
   99:     escalus:fresh_story_with_config(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], Story).
  100: 
  101: max_offline_messages_reached(Config) ->
  102:     Story =
  103:         fun(FreshConfig, Alice, B1, B2, B3, B4) ->
  104:                 BobsResources = [B1,B2,B3,B4],
  105:                 MessagesPerResource = ?MAX_OFFLINE_MSGS div length(BobsResources),
  106: 
  107:                 logout(Alice),
  108:                 each_client_sends_messages_to(BobsResources, Alice,
  109:                                               {count, MessagesPerResource}),
  110: 
  111:                 send_message(B1, Alice, ?MAX_OFFLINE_MSGS+1),
  112:                 Packet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(B1),
  113:                 escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"wait">>, <<"resource-constraint">>], Packet),
  114: 
  115:                 NewAlice = login_send_presence(FreshConfig, alice),
  116:                 Preds = [is_chat(make_chat_text(I))
  117:                          || I <- repeat(lists:seq(1, MessagesPerResource),
  118:                                            length(BobsResources))],
  119:                 escalus_new_assert:mix_match
  120:                   ([is_presence | Preds],
  121:                    escalus:wait_for_stanzas(NewAlice, ?MAX_OFFLINE_MSGS+1)),
  122:                 ct:sleep(500),
  123:                 false = escalus_client:has_stanzas(Alice)
  124:             end,
  125:     escalus:fresh_story_with_config(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 4}], Story).
  126: 
  127: expired_messages_are_not_delivered(Config) ->
  128:     Story =
  129:         fun(FreshConfig, Alice, Bob) ->
  130:                 BobJid = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
  131:                 logout(Bob),
  132:                 escalus:send(Alice,
  133:                              make_message_with_expiry(BobJid, 600000, <<"long">>)),
  134:                 escalus:send(Alice,
  135:                              make_message_with_expiry(BobJid, 1, <<"short">>)),
  136: 
  137:                 ct:sleep(timer:seconds(2)),
  138:                 NewBob = login_send_presence(FreshConfig, bob),
  139: 
  140:                 escalus_new_assert:mix_match
  141:                   ([is_presence, is_chat(<<"long">>)],
  142:                    escalus:wait_for_stanzas(NewBob, 2)),
  143:                 ct:sleep(500),
  144:                 false = escalus_client:has_stanzas(NewBob)
  145:         end,
  146:     escalus:fresh_story_with_config(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], Story).
  147: 
  148: 
  149: %%%===================================================================
  150: %%% Custom predicates
  151: %%%===================================================================
  152: 
  153: is_chat(Content) ->
  154:     fun(Stanza) -> escalus_pred:is_chat_message(Content, Stanza) end.
  155: 
  156: %%%===================================================================
  157: %%% Helpers
  158: %%%===================================================================
  159: 
  160: logout(User) ->
  161:     escalus_client:stop(User),
  162:     timer:sleep(100).
  163: 
  164: login_send_presence(Config, User) ->
  165:     {ok, Client} = escalus_client:start(Config, User, <<"new-session">>),
  166:     escalus:send(Client, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  167:     Client.
  168: 
  169: login_send_and_receive_presence(Config, User) ->
  170:     Client = login_send_presence(Config, User),
  171:     P = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  172:     escalus:assert(is_presence, P),
  173:     Client.
  174: 
  175: each_client_sends_messages_to(Sources, Target, {count, N}) when is_list(Sources) ->
  176:     par:map
  177:         (fun(Source) ->
  178:                  [ send_message(Source, Target, I) || I <- lists:seq(1,N) ]
  179:          end,
  180:          Sources).
  181: 
  182: send_message(From, To, I) ->
  183:     escalus:send(From, escalus_stanza:chat_to(To, make_chat_text(I))),
  184:     timer:sleep(100).
  185: 
  186: make_chat_text(I) ->
  187:     Number = integer_to_binary(I),
  188:     <<"Hi, Offline ", Number/binary>>.
  189: 
  190: make_message_with_expiry(Target, Expiry, Text) ->
  191:     ExpiryBin = list_to_binary(integer_to_list(Expiry)),
  192:     Stanza = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Target, Text),
  193:     #xmlel{children = Children} = Stanza,
  194:     ExpiryElem = #xmlel{name = <<"x">>,
  195:                         attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"jabber:x:expire">>},
  196:                                  {<<"seconds">>, ExpiryBin}]},
  197:     Stanza#xmlel{children = [ExpiryElem | Children]}.
  198: 
  199: repeat(L,0) -> [];
  200: repeat(L,N) -> L ++ repeat(L, N-1).
